Using the sealing formula contained on a sheet of paper or a scroll, the user summons multiple [[shuriken]] from it, which are launched directly at the target.

== Trivia ==
* Despite Tenten using this technique in the anime, it wasn't fully clear on whether she used this technique in [[The Ultimate Art!! (chapter 277)|chapter 277]] of the ''Naruto'' manga.
